name: Tavus
headline: Building the human layer of AI
description: At Tavus, we're building the human layer of AI. Our mission is to make human-AI interaction as natural as face-to-face interaction, enabling the human touch where it has been previously unscalable. We achieve this through pioneering research in multi-modal AI models for human perception and understanding, combined with state-of-the-art human avatar rendering and conversation models that we make accessible to developers worldwide. Our models and APIs power everything from text-to-video AI avatars to real-time conversational video experiences across industries like healthcare, recruiting, sales, education, and more. By enabling AI to see, hear, and communicate with human-like authenticity, we're creating the foundation for developers to create the next generation of AI employees, assistants, and companions.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:b2b; industry:video; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Hassaan Raza, Founder
founders.description: Building the human layer of AI

founders.name: Quinn Favret, Founder

## Build authentic digital twin experiences
VIDEO GENERATION
### Video Generation
Give users the ability to generate videos from a script with AI digital twins.
[See Product](https://www.tavus.io/</product/video-generation>)
Conversational Video Interface
### Conversational Video
Give users the power to have real-time conversations with AI digital twins.
[See Product](https://www.tavus.io/</product/conversational-video>)
## Why developers choose Tavus
### Access cutting-edge white labeled AI technology
Stay focused on your core product, while we handle the intricacies of AI video research.
[See Developer Docs](https://www.tavus.io/<https:/docs.tavus.io/>)
## Best-in-class models powered by unparalleled research
Phoenix-2
Tavus’ groundbreaking Phoenix model generates exceptionally realistic digital replicas, complete with natural face movements and expressions accurately synchronized with input.Use the replica API to build with Video Generation or Conversational Video. 
[Discover the Models](https://www.tavus.io/</product/ai-models>)

## Learn more about our research
[Discover the Models](https://www.tavus.io/</product/ai-models>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63b2f566abde4cad39ba419f/66b7774f42a15fc71d7afa79_Homepage-2.avif)
### A developer first experience
Work with a partner that listens and use a platform that is flexible and modular.
[See Developer Docs](https://www.tavus.io/<https:/docs.tavus.io/>)
### Built-in security and trust
Obsess over your user experience, while we manage end-user security and privacy.
Safety checks ensure users can only make a digital twin of themselves
Comprehensive security protocols, including SOC 2 compliance
Protect your brand with automated content moderation & anti hallucination checks
[See Developer Docs](https://www.tavus.io/<https:/docs.tavus.io/>)
## Dubbing APIs coming soon
Need users to edit a script or dub videos in foreign languages, that match voice and lips? Dubbing & Word Replacement APIs coming soon. 
[Join Waitlist](https://www.tavus.io/<https:/8sknqov6kzm.typeform.com/tavus-API-list>)
## What product development teams say
We partner with Tavus because they have the world’s first conversational solution with under a second of latency. Their tech delivers an incredibly realistic, interactive experience, which is critical to delivering our authentic live mentorship experiences with expert clones. Their developer-first nature is night and day above the rest.
Dara Ladjevardian
Co-Founder & CEO, Delphi
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d54e89026df83dc6107edc/66bcdb84c8db9fd6cf482831_Delphi%20intro%201.png)
We're truly impressed by the speed of development cycles at Tavus. We're thrilled to have a front-row seat to access such high-quality AI video. The overall customer service is excellent, and implementing your APIs was so easy. The AI works seamlessly and it was easily integrated into our current tech stack. Thank you!
Aliosha Milsztein
Co-Founder & CEO, Aurio
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d54e89026df83dc6107edc/66b6c8a44024fd093e7b2ebd_Aurio.png)
Tavus is exceptional. We explored all key players and found Tavus was way ahead in product and customer service. The APIs were super easy to implement, we pulled together a prototype in a matter of days. Now that we’ve launched, we’re extremely pleased with the high standard of the personal replicas.
Morgan Edmondson
Co-Founder, Nesti
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d54e89026df83dc6107edc/66ba5af004a20eed5aab7540_65f9b09dd9b7c6d7670a480e_White%20Minimalist%20Elegant%20Handwritten%20LinkedIn%20Banner%20\(38\)%201.png)
We are filling an expertise gap with Tavus. We needed a company on the bleeding edge of AI video. Experts in research who can iterate quickly on our behalf. We love that it’s white labeled and seamlessly fits into our video sales platform. Tavus replicas have a wow factor. Customers can’t believe it’s generated video. 
Product Leader
Leading Video Platform (10m+ users)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63d54e89026df83dc6107edc/66ba5ba5125d250361cb9060_unicorn.png)

generated_description:
**Tavus: Building the Human Layer of AI**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Tavus is ramping up the way we interact with AI by making it feel more human. The company, based in San Francisco and employing around 30 people, is on a mission to enhance human-AI interaction to be as seamless and natural as face-to-face communication.

### What They Do

Essentially, Tavus provides powerful tools that allow developers to create truly innovative AI experiences. This includes everything from text-to-video AI avatars to real-time conversational interfaces. Their technology focuses on replicating human perception and understanding using multi-modal AI models—think of them as the behind-the-scenes nerds turning the sci-fi dream of digital twins into reality.

The flagship offerings include:
- **Video Generation**: Create videos from scripts using realistic AI avatars.
- **Conversational Video Interface**: Engage in real-time conversations with AI that feels genuine.
- **AI Models**: Access advanced, highly realistic digital replicas through their API, powered by their innovative Phoenix model.

### Target Markets

Tavus' technology is applicable across various industries, including:
- Healthcare
- Recruiting
- Sales
- Education

It’s clear that Tavus wants to enable businesses to leverage AI for tasks that had previously been too complex or unscalable.

### Why Tavus Stands Out

Tavus emphasizes a developer-first approach, providing extensive resources, documentation, and support to ensure smooth integration. Its models are not just about generating cool content; they're engineered for realism and responsiveness. According to feedback from users, their technology offers impressively low latency and high fidelity—making AI interactions almost indistinguishable from real human contacts.

They are also considerate about privacy and security, ensuring that user experiences are safeguarded with comprehensive protocols. With features like safety checks and content moderation, they’re aiming for an ethical approach in AI deployment.

### Looking Ahead

Tavus is not just stopping at what they have; they’re constantly evolving their offering—dubbing APIs and language support enhancements are on the horizon. Their ambition signals a strong belief in the future where AI can uphold the "human touch," responsibly and authentically.

In conclusion, Tavus is carving a niche in the AI landscape, driven by innovation and a clear vision for future interactions. They offer not just tools, but a pathway to a more genuine integration of technology into our daily lives. You can explore their offerings further at [Tavus.io](https://www.tavus.io).
